function.name: Display Message
function.description: This function is called by the Messaging client plugin whenever the application should display a message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: The message that should be displayed.

function.name: Cancel Message
function.description: This function is called by the Messaging client plugin whenever the application should stop displaying a message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: The message that should no longer be displayed.
